channel.title: Microsoft Machine Learning Server on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Machine Learning Server on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 22
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth, that has to do with things that interest me:

  • data science
  • data in general
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog-post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me, for the week just ending.

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 42
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, etc., that has to do with things that interest me

  • data science
  • data in general
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This is the “roundup” of the posts that has been most interesting to me, for the week just gone by.

This week I have very little to post, mainly due to me being out of the country, and not having been able to read as much as I would have liked.
